tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (PP (IN About) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB decorate) (NP (DT the) (NNP Christmas) (NN Tree)) (FRAG (ADVP (-LRB- -LRB-)) (: :)))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [decorate/VB mark>About/IN mark>to/TO dobj>[Tree/NN det>the/DT compound>Christmas/NNP] dep>[-LRB-/-LRB- punct>:/:]]
